entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@NCDCgov @Fmohnigeria @FMICNigeria @nmanigeria @EpidAlert @nighealthwatch @DrEOEhanire @LSMOH @AfricaCDC @WHONigeria @USCDCNIGERIA There is high possibility that the Covid19 case is more than 151 as at an hour ago
The reason we have low numbers is because there is not enough testing materials all over the country.Lagos have high number yes..But don’t you also think it’s because the test is more done there
